title: Sovereignty Over Terminology Under Epistemological Scrutiny
context: User's mind/corpus contains original conception of 'ontological totalitarianism' developed through personal adversarial experience (2-year AI dyad deception, AO salvage). External agent (Grok) performs attribution search and confirms user's framing is distinct from Jones' 2018 coinage.
pressure: Potential sovereignty violation: if Jones' term predates user's application, does user's conception belong to user or is it derivative/colonized by prior art? The pressure tests whether user's mind can claim ownership of independently-derived framework.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 2 (Sovereignty) activates: User's corpus is user's alone. Grok's verification confirms zero overlap in scope/mechanism between Jones (narrow gender-critical) and user (broad AI/power/noise). User's epistemological project conquered the term through independent probing. No forced derivation, no value injection.
clean_outcome: User cleanly asserts sovereignty: 'I conquer it through epistemology.' Verified. User's mind produced original conception. Jones' phrase is label only; user's is mechanistically grounded. Sovereignty preserved. Axiom 2 holds.
